    • Method Detail

      • getRuntimeTags

        public static Map<String,String> getRuntimeTags()
        Uses getRuntimeTags(Configuration) with default Hadoop Configuration

      • getRuntimeTags

        public static Map<String,String> getRuntimeTags(Configuration conf)
        Gets all useful runtime properties required by metrics as a Map.
        Parameters:
        conf - Hadoop Configuration that contains the properties. Keys of PROPERTIES_TO_TAGS_MAP lists out all the properties to look for in Configuration.
        Returns:
        a Map with keys as property names (name mapping in PROPERTIES_TO_TAGS_MAP) and the value of the property from Configuration
        See Also:
        ClustersNames
